channel.title: Server is always down
channel.description:
When i try to log into a server or even make my own it says error connecting to server. Must be down.Click "cancel" then start server to make your own. I tried that too and it doesnt work and its been like this since yesterday.
WHat do i do to fix it?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2007, 06:55:11 AM[/size][hr]nvm clost this post i figured it out thanks

well its either your firewall or if your not using hamachi correctly…
